basics.name: Ilies Tabyaoui
basics.label: Bachelor’s student in Computer Science and Data Science
basics.summary: Motivated Computer Science and Data Science student, currently in the second year of a Bachelor of Technology (BUT) in Computer Science. Passionate about IT, cybersecurity, and emerging technologies, I am currently looking for a summer internship (8–10 weeks starting June 9, 2025) and a work-study position starting in September 2025 to continue my studies. Curious, adaptable, and dedicated, I am eager to gain hands-on experience and contribute to innovative tech projects.

work.name: SNCF
work.position: Bilingual Host at SNCF Station for Paris 2024 Olympics
work.summary: Welcoming and guiding international visitors at the SNCF station for the Paris 2024 Olympics.
highlights: Successfully assisted international visitors and provided seamless travel experiences.
responsibilities: Greeted and oriented international visitors at the SNCF station.
Made announcements in English to provide clear information to passengers.
achievements: Provided excellent customer service to Olympic visitors, ensuring smooth station experiences during the event.

work.name: ID Logistics
work.summary: Responsible for managing logistics operations such as goods reception, storage, and shipping.
highlights: Successfully contributed to efficient logistics and operations.
responsibilities: Handled the reception, storage, and shipment of goods.
Assisted in order preparation operations to ensure timely deliveries.
achievements: Contributed to streamlining logistics operations, improving overall efficiency in the warehouse.

work.name: Intermarché
work.summary: Responsible for daily restocking of shelves and maintaining store organization.
highlights: Maintained a well-organized and stocked store environment.
responsibilities: Restocked shelves daily and ensured product availability.
Monitored inventory levels and ensured product rotation.
achievements: Contributed to maintaining store organization, enhancing customer shopping experience.

volunteer.summary: Helped organize coding workshops and mentored new members.

projects.name: Personal Portfolio
projects.description: A personal portfolio website to showcase my projects and skills.
highlights: Focus on performance and fast loading times
Showcases web development projects and technical skills
Integrated React and Tailwind CSS for dynamic features

projects.name: Automatic Acquisition of 3GPP Meeting Data in Collaboration with Thales
projects.description: A project to build an application that automates the acquisition, analysis, and visualization of meeting data from 3GPP working groups.
highlights: Development of an application to extract, analyze, and visualize meeting data from the 3GPP working group.
The application includes an interactive dashboard that automates data collection and analysis.

projects.name: E-commerce Website Creation
projects.description: Development of a dynamic e-commerce website for managing products and user interactions with a database.
highlights: Developed a website to interact with a database, including features for reading, modifying, and deleting records.

projects.name: Analysis of a Data Set (Price Food in India)
projects.description: Analyzed a dataset of food prices in India using SQL and Python, with insights gathered through Excel and Power BI.
highlights: Analysis of a Kaggle dataset with SQL queries implemented in Python.
Data was analyzed using Excel and Power BI for further insights.
